ABOUT US

This is what was missing in Delhi NCR all this while and so close to the city. ATV trails and rides. Come and enjoy Adventurous Rides in natural and rocky terrains on ATVs (All-terrain Vehicle)!!

Experience the sheer power, adrenaline rush and the smell of the soil.

25 min drive from Gurgaon &
15 min drive from Noida.
15 min from GK, South Delhi,
Metro station: Badarpur

The Trails you will traverse will go through Rocky Hills, Hill tops, diverse vegetation, Ancient Ponds with infinite views of the horizon. Marvel the technology of ATV machines in these terrains.

Trails: 1-5 KM Long

• Recreational/picnic arrangement for Elders and children.
• Full service restaurant
• Washrooms
• Activity-Amphitheatre
• Camel Ride
• Sculpture Garden
• Nature Hikes
• Ample Parking
• Tractor Ride

Kindly bring one of the following IDs:
• Passport
• Driving License
• Voter card
• Adhaar card
• College/University ID
